author: Vertyco
description: This cog is a conglomerate of commands made for my convenience either from scratch or revised/pulled from other cogs. Notable mentions are Trusty's Serverstats cog, kennnyshiwa's ImperialToolkit cog, and PhasecoreX's netspeed cog.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store data about users.
short: Utility commands inspired or recycled from various utility cogs.
